description: This source file defines a RecyclerView adapter called FoldersListAdapter for displaying a list of Folder objects in an Android application. It manages the dataset, creates view holders, binds data to views, and handles click events for folder items and delete buttons.

classes.name: FoldersListAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView.Adapter implementation to display a list of Folder objects with click and delete actions.

methods.name: submitList
methods.description: Updates the dataset with a new list, calculating differences to optimize UI updates.

classes.name: FoldersListAdapter.VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class holding references to item views for folder name and delete button.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Binds a Folder object's data (name) to the TextView.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and returns a new ViewHolder for a folder item.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the number of folder items in the dataset.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data to the ViewHolder and sets click listeners for folder item and delete button.
